briefTitle: Omega-3 Fatty Acids Plus Low-dose Aspirin Daily Supplementation in Surgical Therapy to Treat Aggressive Periodontitis

armGroups.label: Test Group
interventionNames: Dietary Supplement: Omega-3 polyunsaturated fatty acids

outcomeMeasures.title: Clinical Attachment Level at Baseline, 3 Months and 6 Months
outcomeMeasures.description: Evaluate the difference between baseline and 6 months CAL measures. CAL: distance from bottom of sulcus/pocket to the cement-enamel junction (CEJ). The CEJ will be identified by careful probe on cervical area.

outcomeMeasures.title: Probing Depth at Baseline, 3 Months and 6 Months
outcomeMeasures.description: Evaluate the difference between baseline and 6 months PB measures. PB: distance from the bottom of sulcus/pocket to gingival margin.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Sites With Bleeding on Probe at Baseline, 3 Months and 6 Months
outcomeMeasures.description: Evaluate the difference between baseline and 6 months BoP measures. BoP: bleeding that is induced by gentle probing of the sulcus/pocket.
